entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing this morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning after midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 07 February 2023
